item1_summary:
Camden Property Trust, a Texas real estate investment trust, and all consolidated subsidiaries are primarily engaged in the ownership, management, development, development and reposition, redevelopment, acquisition, and construction of multifamily apartment communities . Unless the context requires otherwise, "we," "our," "us," and the "Company" refer to Camden Property trust and its consolidated subsidiaries .
 As of December 31, 2024, we owned interests in, operated, or were developing 177 multifamily properties . Of the 177 properties, three properties were under construction and will consist of a total of 1,138 apartment homes when completed . We rely heavily on our sophisticated property management capabilities and innovative operating strategies to maximize the earnings potential of our communities .
 We believe, where possible, it is best to operate with a strong base of properties in order to benefit from the personnel allocation and the market strength associated with managing multiple properties in the same market . We intend to continue to seek opportunities to acquire communities, develop new communities, and to reposition existing communities . We expect to maintain a strong balance sheet and preserve our financial flexibility .
 We believe the depth of our organization enables us to deliver quality services, promote resident satisfaction, and reduce our operating expenses . We manage our properties utilizing a staff of professionals and support personnel, including certified property managers, experienced property managers and leasing staff . Lease terms are generally staggered based on vacancy exposure by apartment type such that lease expirations are matched to each property's seasonal rental patterns .
 There are numerous housing alternatives which compete with our communities in attracting residents . We strive to differentiate ourselves by our culture and talent . We believe our workplace reflects Camden’s nine core values: Customer Focused; People Driven; Team Players; Lead by Example; Results Oriented; Work Smart; Always Do the Right Thing; Act with Integrity; and Have Fun .
 CamdenU, our in-house learning center, is available to all employees and offers courses in subjects related to leadership, management, and operations . We encourage team members to discover their individual strengths and cultivate new interests . We have formal programs intended to positively impact team members such as healthcare, rent discounts, education allowances, and scholarships .
 Camden embraces all team members as full and valued members of the organization . yees to facilitate their on-boarding process and immerse them in Camden’s culture. yees . At December 31, 2024, we had approximately 1,660 employees including executive, community, and administrative personnel. The company will not be subject to federal income tax .
